message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you like the product, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. Would you be willing to consider that price?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $125, but I think that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $125. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $115?

I'm starting to get a bit worried that we won't meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one final offer of $135. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.
I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I still think $130 is a bit too high. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $128?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $140, Bob. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.
I'm willing to meet you at $140, but I need to think about it. Can you hold off on selling it to anyone else for 24 hours to give me some time to think?
